column2: I received this recipe through a cookie exchange years ago, and it has become a favorite of family and friends.
This three-layer salad includes a pretzel crust, cream cheese center, and strawberry top.
These delicate crepes are rolled up with a fluffy cream cheese filling and sliced strawberries. Make these as a dessert treat during strawberry season, or for a fancy weekend brunch.

column1: Curry Stand Chicken Tikka Masala Sauce
column2: Chunks of chicken simmer in a spicy tomato and cream sauce for the bright orange chicken tikka masala you crave.
